price: Sεdeε Yεde bεyε wͻn nsͻhwε. Na obi a ͻbεtwe ne ho afri ne Wura Nyankopͻn Afutusεm no ho no, Ɔbεma no akͻ asotwee kεseε paa mu.
arabic: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِۚ وَمَن يُعۡرِضۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَابٗا صَعَدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: linaftinahum fīhi waman yuʿ'riḍ ʿan dhik'ri rabbihi yasluk'hu ʿadhāban ṣaʿadan
